Judul: OPTIMAL CAPITAL STRUCTURE ANALYSIS (Using Adjusted Present Value (APV) and Weighted Average Cost of Capital (WACC) Approaches)
Abstrak: Capital Structure is one of the most important aspects of any companies in running business since the capital structure is the mixture of debt and equity as the companies' sources of funds. According to this, the companies are asked to be able to maintain their capital structure to get the optimal capital structure. The importance of getting the optimal capital structure is because it delivers the highest firm value that indicates shareholders' value.
Kata Kunci: Adjusted Present Value Approach, Weighted Average Cost of Capital Approach
